name: Escape is Up
description:
YOU HAVE TO PLAY ON FULLSCREEN. I didn't program other resolutions, reasons below.

My very first game! It's absolutely awful, buuuut it's still mine.

Is like an ugly kid. But it's still my kid.

Press 'space' to fly, press 'f' to shoot collected ravens. 

Fly to heaven once you reach 100 seconds surviving.

I wonder what happens if you don't.

Also I didn't program other resolutions. PLAY IN FULL SCREEN.
